txt.en: You defeated Thrâng, and in the process, learned that the Ghâshfra serve the Ever-seer. Eimyr, Chieftain of the Eldgang, should be told at once, for he has been deceived by the Ever-seer and unwittingly serves his evil purposes.

'You have defeated Thrâng of the Ghâshfra? You have earned a great reward from the Eldgang.

'What is this you say? The Ghâshfra serve the Ever-seer? The Ever-seer seeks to unleash the Great Evil upon us?

'The Eldgang will not stand idle and allow this thing to happen. We have been betrayed!'
'You have earned the respect of the Eldgang, little one. Now we will see to the Ever-seer!'
'The Eldgang have naught to do with you, little one. Begone!'
You have defeated Thrâng and uncovered the plot of the Ever-seer.
Bring the Sword of Thrâng to Eimyr at Norbar

Eimyr can be found within Norbar in The Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu.\n\nYou have defeated Thrâng and hold his weapon as proof of your valour. You should go to Eimyr and tell him of the Ever-seer's evil betrayal.
